movies.description: This movie is so hilariously bad and embarrassing it is a crime not to watch it. It is the epitome of the Twilight-era.
I'm not sure much needs to be said here. However, I think we can all agree that the joy of watching this movie far exceeds the embarrassment that it exists.

Going into this film and expecting a masterpiece is a mistake. What you should be doing is going into the film expecting a fun 90s action movie where everyone is sorta in on the joke. Nic Cage is also great here, as he is often.
So bad I almost didn't include it. Too bad to absolutely not include it here. Plus, Halle Berry
An absolute disgrace of a horror film. An absolute disgrace of a horror film that I was always sure to watch whenever it came on Spike TV.
This is another one where I feel like not much has to be said. This movie hits all the points of being absolutely horrendous while being so incredibly enjoyable to watch.
